# CopyPasta3 Release Notes

This file contains one line summaries of commits that are worthy of mentioning in release notes.

**Do not edit this file unless you are performing a release.**

Instead, if you are authoring a PR for the main branch, add your release note to

[NEW_RELEASE_NOTES.md](./NEW_RELEASE_NOTES.md).

## 1.1.2
- Now users can move up or down the stored items in the list.
- The minimap icon now correctly opens the options window via right-click.

## 1.1.1
- Show `Whisper Target` when only necessary.

## 1.1.0
- Support for saving and loading multi-line commands is now available.

## 1.0.2
- Add release scripts
- CopyPasta3 icon is properly displayed in the addon list

## 1.0.1
- Fix version number

## 1.0.0
- Initial upload
